select
from apply_product_sku_config a left join apply_product_sku_config_spare_warehouse b on a.apply_code = b.apply_code left join product_sku c on a.sku_code = c.sku_code where a.apply_code = #{applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select distinct form_no from apply_product_sku_config where apply_code = #{applyCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
